caseTitle: Mian Muhammad Nawaz Sharif v. Imran Ahmed Khan Niazi
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Asif Saeed Khan Khosa
tagline: All review petitions are dismissed for reasons to be recorded later while the petitioner in Civil Miscellaneous Application No. 6114 of 2017 in Constitution Petition No. 30 of 2016, in view of the information supplied and the statement made by the learned Prosecutor-General, Accountability that the Chairman, National Accountability Bureau has approved filing of an appeal against the judgment passed by the Lahore High Court, Lahore in the case of M/S Hudabiya Paper Mills, does not press the miscellaneous application which is disposed of as having not been pressed.
